name: D.O.O.T
description:
As part of the Games Development course, we had to create a 3D adventure game. Amongst a pool of games to draw inspiration from, I was torn between the idea of creating a 3D Maze game or a Doom replica. That is when an idea sparked in my mind; why not both? This is D.O.O.T - Defence Ordnance Operations Training.

Check out this link to read more about it!
